title: Eines de l’Institut Metròpoli

1 + 1

[1] 2

title: Organització
text:
cbind(noms = c("a","b","c"),
      codi = c(1,2,3), 
      color = c("red", "blue", "green"))

     noms codi color  
[1,] "a"  "1"  "red"  
[2,] "b"  "2"  "blue" 
[3,] "c"  "3"  "green"
